name: Super Leprechaun World – A Classic Retro Old Style Console Platformer St. Patricks Day Edition
name_original: Super Leprechaun World – A Classic Retro Old Style Console Platformer St. Patricks Day Edition
description:
Super Leprechaun World is a fun and addictive game that will bring back memories of those classic console oldies that you grew up loving! Embark on a happy quest through lucky land to find all of the golden keys. Don’t miss out on this nostalgic retro console adventure!

FEATURES

- Conquer 4 beautiful classic retro style levels
- Collect coins to unlock 5 different playable characters
- Awesome 8 bit soundtrack
- Game center enabled

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback on a future update? We are dedicated to providing the highest level of support and we would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com.
